snippet: The cause of the blast, which occurred in a marine boat repair shop at a weapons station, was still under investigation.
abstract: Explosion at Navy base in New Jersey leaves at least eight people hurt, one of them seriously;  officials say cause is still under investigation and damage is contained in the boathouse area.
lead_paragraph: The cause of the blast, which occurred in a marine boat repair shop at a weapons station, was still under investigation.

headline.main: 8 Injured in Explosion at Navy Station in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Blast Injures 8 at a Base in New Jersey

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
